metadata.title: CVE-2023-4356 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Audio in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.96 allowed aremote attacker who has convinced a user to engage in specific UIinteraction to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
